DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion administered twice daily following LASIK surgery
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Cyclosporine Ophthalmic Emulsion in Post-LASIK Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient is scheduled for bilateral LASIK surgery Patient is in good general health Eye glasses prescription of 1 to 8 Significant Dry Eye Presence of eye disease Uncontrolled systemic disease
